00049 /**
00050  * @brief Default Getter method for parameters and their documentation.
00051  * @return map of parameters and their descriptions.
00052  */
00053 std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> CNAnalysisMethodKernelSmooth::getDefaultDocOptions()
00054     {
00055     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts;
00056 
00057     // SelfDoc::Opt(name, type, value, default, min, max, description)
00058 
00059     SelfDoc::Opt sigma_span = {"sigma_span", SelfDoc::Opt::Double,
00060         "50.0", "50.0", "0.0", "NA", "Probes spanned by one stdev"};
00061     opts.push_back(sigma_span);
00062 
00063     return opts;
00064     }

00067 /**
00068  * @brief This static function should be overridden by child classes
00069  * to return an object of the correct type initialized correctly
00070  * with the parameters in the string, string map. All objects
00071  * created this way should be deleted when finished using.
00072  *
00073  * @param param - Map of key/value pairs to initialize the object.
00074  *
00075  * @return Pointer toCreate object, this should be sub casted as necessary.
00076  */
00077 SelfCreate * CNAnalysisMethodKernelSmooth::newObject(
00078     std::map<std::string,std::string>& params)
00079     {
00080     SelfDoc doc = explainSelf();
00081     std::vector<SelfDoc::Opt> opts = getDefaultDocOptions();
00082     CNAnalysisMethodKernelSmooth* pMethod = new CNAnalysisMethodKernelSmooth();
00083     std::string strPrefix = getPrefix();
00084 
00085     pMethod->m_sigma_span = setupDoubleParameter("sigma_span",
00086         strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00087 
00088     /*
00089     pMethod->m_iXChromosome = setupIntParameter("xChromosome",
00090         strPrefix, params, doc, opts);
00091     */
00092 
00093     return pMethod;
00094     }

00096 //constructor
00097 CNAnalysisMethodKernelSmooth::CNAnalysisMethodKernelSmooth()

00099         m_bLocalProbeSetsDetermined=false;

00104 /**
00105  * @brief Run the analysis
00106  */
00107 void CNAnalysisMethodKernelSmooth::run()
00108     {
00109     Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodKernelSmooth::run(...) start");
00110 
00111     isSetup();
00112 
00113     determineLocalProbeSets();
00114 
00115     vector<int>chromosomes = getChromosomes(getProbeSets());
00116 
00117     GaussianKernel GK(m_sigma_span);
00118 
00119     for (unsigned int k=0; k<chromosomes.size(); k++)
00120         {
00121         int chr = chromosomes[k];
00122         pair<int,int>chr_span = getChrBounds(chr, getProbeSets());
00123 
00124         unsigned int start = chr_span.first;
00125         unsigned int span = (unsigned int)(chr_span.second - chr_span.first);
00126         vector<double>smooth_me(span);
00127         for (unsigned int i=0; i<span; i++)
00128             smooth_me[i] = getProbeSets()->getAt(i + start)->getLog2Ratio();
00129 
00130         kernel_smooth(smooth_me, GK);
00131 
00132         for (unsigned int i=0; i<span; i++)
00133             {
00134             getProbeSets()->getAt(i+start)->setSmoothedLog2Ratio(smooth_me[i]);
00135             }
00136         }
00137     if (m_pEngine->getOptBool("keep-intermediate-data"))
00138     {
00139         writeSmoothedLog2Ratios("kernelSmoothed", getProbeSets());
00140     }
00141 
00142 //    Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done");
00143     Verbose::out(1, "CNAnalysisMethodKernelSmooth::run(...) end");
00144     }
00145 void CNAnalysisMethodKernelSmooth::determineLocalProbeSets()
00146 {
00147         if(m_bLocalProbeSetsDetermined)
00148         {
00149                 return;
00150         }
00151         const bool isCytoScanHD = m_pEngine->getOptBool("cytoscan-hd");
00152         int iNumberOfProbeSets=CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getCount();
00153         for (int iIndex = 0; iIndex<iNumberOfProbeSets; iIndex++)
00154         {
00155                 if( CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getAt(iIndex)->processAll() )
00156                 {
00157                                                 if (isCytoScanHD && (!CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getAt(iIndex)->processAsCN())) {continue;}
00158                         getProbeSets()->add( CNAnalysisMethod::getProbeSets()->getAt(iIndex));
00159                 }
00160         }
00161         m_bLocalProbeSetsDetermined=true;
00162 }
